item.title: Writing a mini Redis server in Elixir
item.description: In the previous post, we wrote a simple Redis Protocol specification (RESP) parser. That’s just a small part towards to build a mini Redis. Let’s continue writing the other parts needed for our mini Redis server. Here’s how the overall architecture looks like: Redis CLI <-> Redis Server (TCP) <-> RESP Parser â†“ Key Value Store We will use redis-cli as the Redis client and write the following parts:
